name: Flatgame- Into The Top
description:
This is a simple flatgame for a game development class. The only goal is the one that is in the title - Get "Into the Top".

Thanks for downloading it and if something went wrong with the game, send a comment and I can fix it.

The cover is the volcano "Iztaccihuatl" in Mexico, photo was taken from the mountain "Ajusco".
